7578a675-ac14-490a-9126-20812605c144.description: Designed to equip participants with the tools to be more effective at any stage of their career. Participants will return with the enhanced communication and organizational skills that come with understanding project management, team dynamics and communication techniques
7578a675-ac14-490a-9126-20812605c144.name: Management Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by Kaiser Permanente - Finance Leadership Institute

badge_template_activities.title: KP STORY & FC UNCONSCIOUS BIAS; Dr. Paul Bernstein, Kaiser Permanente official historian, will share our origins as the first true health care system and how that has impacted where we are today as an organization. Unconscious Bias Experiential Learning Program will guide the participants to foster an inclusive work environment.

PROJECT MANAGEMENT ESSENTIALS; This course will guide participants through the essentials of the people and project management process: Initiate, Plan, Execute, Monitor/Control, and Close. They will learn to implement a disciplined process to execute projects and to master informal authority to inspire the team.

What Motivates Me & BRANDING; In this unique, highly interactive workshop, participants will be invited to engage in activities designed to deepen their understanding of group/team dynamics and the huge factor that “trust” plays in group dynamics. Designed to help polish existing skills and improve professional image. This work session provides important tools for building solid, productive relationships with business associates.

INFLUENCE & COMMUNICATION; Using how we Influence, and Communication skills refresh to help communicate more effectively in life. Focus is on the written word, spoken word and on improving active listening techniques.This experiential course is geared at improving communication skills in the workplace but can be applied in any aspect of life.

MINDFULNESS; Mindfulness is paying attention (on purpose) in the present moment, without judgment. Participants will learn how to use mindfulness to relate differently to stress – through mindful movement, meditation, and group discussion. The course teaches practical ways to integrate mindfulness into daily life to build and sustain a personal mindfulness practice.

skills.name: Deepen your awareness of dynamics in your team and how to engage most effectively
Increase awareness and understanding of unconscious bias
Learn techniques for self-promotion
Learn the techniques to help you communicate comfortably in any situation
Learn the tools to nourish mind and body
Provide participants with the mindset, skillset, and toolset that will enable them to consistently deliver successful projects to completion.
Set intentions on how to build Mindfulness practices into personal and professional life
Understand the benefits of Mindfulness for ourselves and for our teams
Understand tools for discovering your own personal brand

396d459e-dd3f-40d7-a092-fe1946641378.description: The participant has enriched the quality of their current leadership skills. The participant has an enhanced set of skills in performance management, team management and stakeholder engagement. The participant worked with cohort members in an ongoing case study throughout the year with the guidance of a coach and was asked to present their findings to a group of their peers and senior leaders during the final seminar.
396d459e-dd3f-40d7-a092-fe1946641378.name: Effective Leadership 2022

issuer.summary: issued by Kaiser Permanente - Finance Leadership Institute

alignments.name: National Association of State Boards of Accountancy
alignments.description: NASBA certifies all of our classes.

badge_template_activities.title: DEVELOPING THE LEADER WITHIN YOU; Participants will work through John C. Maxwell's ten leadership and team building principles that he believes everyone should know and understand in order to move beyond simply managing people to leading them.

COLORCODE; Participants will leave with an understanding of their own strengths and development opportunities during the Colorcode session, by allowing more proactive strategy that fosters a sense of "one team" such as making decisions in which everyone is able to be heard.

CAPTIVATING PRESENTATIONS; Participants will learn tips and tricks to creating engaging and powerful presentations. Content will range from basic PowerPoint rules and design to storyline and mental preparation. When they leave, participants will have tools for being a more captivating speaker.

7 HABITS OF HIGHLY EFFECTIVE PEOPLE; Participants explore how to achieve personal and interpersonal effectiveness, based on concepts from “The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People,” written by Stephen R. Covey. Participants not only learn to be more effective, but also how to use processes and tools to live and apply the 7 Habits every day.

skills.name: Allow diverse groups of people to lead projects and make decisions
Collaborate more effectively with others by building high-trust relationships
Develop innovative solutions that leverage diversity
Gain tools for self-development and people development
Learn skills to develop shared goals with a team
Learn the 5 Levels of Leadership
Learn to focus and act on what can be controlled and influenced
Powerful communication
Recognize and deal with different personalities

2026f99b-5364-4d2f-9f2c-b5166e2a20eb.description: Designed to equip participants with the tools to be more effective at any stage of their career. 1a8b16d1-94da-4bc7-9acc-cc194be399f4.description: Designed to develop and enhance participants’ existing leadership skills in communication and trust. Participants will return with a heightened awareness of emotional intelligence and the value it plays in our everyday interactions. They will combine the tools from this program to communicate effectively with the ability to extend, build, and restore trust. Interdependent Leadership delivers a powerful learning experience through creating a forum to understand the interdependence of KP.
1a8b16d1-94da-4bc7-9acc-cc194be399f4.name: Interdependent Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by Kaiser Permanente - Finance Leadership Institute

badge_template_activities.title: KP STORY & Innovation; Dr. Paul Bernstein, Kaiser Permanente official historian, will share our origins as the first true health care system and how that has impacted where we are today and where we are going as an organization.

LEADING AT THE SPEED OF TRUST – 2 DAYS; A highly interactive workshop that engages leaders of all levels, coaching them in the real work of identifying and closing the trust gaps that exist. The course teaches managers and leaders pragmatic, practical, and actionable skills that can be implemented immediately regardless of their role in the organization.

MASTERING EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE LEVEL 1; Based on the bestselling book “Emotional Intelligence,“ by Travis Bradberry & Jean Greaves, this class introduces the key concepts of emotional intelligence and understanding the link between EQ and business outcomes.

SECRETS FOR EXCEPTIONAL SPEAKING; The Secrets course simplifies into a step-by-step technique the very complex concepts of communicating and presenting effectively. The Hendrie Method™ teaches you to communicate effectively with anyone in any situation. You actively learn the Three Key Elements needed to develop natural, effective delivery styles.

skills.name: Develop awareness and understanding of the mindset, skillset & toolset needed for trust
Engage in team discussions on ways to foster an inclusive work environment
Learn about the 5 Waves of Trust and how they impact business outcomes
Learn how emotion is created, so you can communicate thoughts and feelings
Practice how to sound more conversational with your material and connect with listeners
Recognize the 4 core EQ skills
Understand how 9 different styles are expressed, so you can tailor your style and speak with vocal variety
Understand the biological basis and business case for EQ

c19ec672-c9d3-4b39-adf3-dc4c487a8503.description: Designed to develop and enhance participants’ existing leadership skills in communication and trust. Participants will return with a heightened awareness of emotional intelligence and the value it plays in our everyday interactions. They will combine the tools from this program to communicate effectively with the ability to extend, build, and restore trust. Interdependent Leadership delivers a powerful learning experience through creating a forum to understand the interdependence of KP.
c19ec672-c9d3-4b39-adf3-dc4c487a8503.name: Interdependent Leadership ALUMNI
